ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
½ medium head cabbage, cored and coarsely chopped
1 can Italian-style stewed tomatoes, undrained, cut up

cookingTips: Render bacon fat first for deep, savory base flavor
Chop cabbage into consistent pieces so it cooks evenly
Simmer gently for 20-30 minutes to let flavors meld and cabbage become tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a hearty, straightforward soup. Do you feel comfortable managing sodium levels by adjusting salt and broth? How do you prefer to build flavor layers in soups like this?
